name: obsidian-bullet-colors
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.dev-watch: nx watch --project=obsidian-bullet-colors -- rsync -av ./apps/bullet-colors/dist/ ~/Documents/juri-pkb/.obsidian/plugins/bullet-colors && npm run dev
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
